AlignedPointsDistance: Distance between each point of the same angle
ConeDegrees: Maximum degrees of the generated cone
AngleStep:
The step of the angle increase. Angle step must be >=1
Smaller values generate less items
CenterActor: The actor (or actors) that will generate a cone in their facing direction
bIncludeContextLocation:
Whether to include CenterActors' locations when generating items.
    Note that this option skips the MinAngledPointsDistance parameter.
